CN.content:

Paragraph: PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) has high hole mobility ( 0.05 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ) and broad photocurrent response wavelengths from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

The entities "PDTP" and "DTDPP(Bu)" are material names, and "holes mobility", "photocurrent response", and "wavelengths" are material properties. The entities "from" and "to" are prepositions indicating the range of the property "wavelengths".
